parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **30 to 100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the task. This parameter is invalid.

parameters.name: TaskAction
parameters.description: The operation that is used by the task.
